name: Keyhunter
description:
Bind your way through a dangerous facility in this colorful and fast puzzle game!

How to play:

While figuring out the gameplay yourself is very satisfying, here's how the game works: In the keybind menu that comes up with key E, all the controls are unbound and it is up to you to configure them as you want. You can change the direction of a control arrow by right clicking and drag them to different controls by holding the left mouse button. As the game progresses, you will have more elements to bind your keys and gradually become less "out of control". You should mix and match them to solve any puzzle you're facing. Good luck, and have fun!
